timeline.bodyText:
Just for clarity: According to the new code I think we would stay on the error page in the case of a warning.
Is this intended?
timeline.author: SaMuellerDLR

replies.bodyText: Yes this is intended. We want to react to warnings as well. It is also not staying on the page, but prominently showing it.
replies.author: PhilMFischer
